channel.title: My first sword in Autodesk Maya + Beginning on new weapon!
channel.description:
Hey guys, so I'm not really gonna say much except for this is my first model using maya. It took less than 2 minutes and I was going pretty slow when making this... :P
[IMG]http://i783.photobucket.com/albums/yy117/Mercifies/Models%20in%20Maya/1-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i783.photobucket.com/albums/yy117/Mercifies/Models%20in%20Maya/2-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i783.photobucket.com/albums/yy117/Mercifies/Models%20in%20Maya/3-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i783.photobucket.com/albums/yy117/Mercifies/Models%20in%20Maya/4.jpg[/img]
And here are some images of my upcoming model. I am not sure what I want to make it, whether it should be a spear/sword/mace/whip give me some feedback on what you guys would like to see. Thanks. Please, no flamming.
[IMG]http://i783.photobucket.com/albums/yy117/Mercifies/Models%20in%20Maya/99.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i783.photobucket.com/albums/yy117/Mercifies/Models%20in%20Maya/100.jpg[/img]
This one took like 10 minutes to where it is at so far because lining up all of the things perfectly was a bit of a pain in the A**.

item.title: My first sword in Autodesk Maya + Beginning on new weapon!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

It’s about quality, not quantity.
